titleStmt.title: The life of the most learned, reverend and pious Dr. H. Hammond written by John Fell ...
titleStmt.author: Fell, John, 1625-1686.
Waring, Robert, 1614-1658.
Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.
Langbaine, Gerard, 1609-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Flesher for Jo. Martin, Ja. Allestry and Tho. Dicas ...,

notesStmt.note: Authorship of this work has been claimed by Robert Waring and variously attributed to John Fell, Richard Allestree and Gerard Langbaine -- cf. Madan, Falconer. Oxford books, v. 2, p. 459.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
